vista.app
Class MultiDataSetTableModel

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      vista.app.MultiDataSetTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
public class MultiDataSetTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel

An adapter to adapt the data sets to the table model to allow representation of the data set as a table.

Version:
$Id: MultiDataSetTableModel.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:48:35 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
